article_title: Booz Partners Approve Acquisition by PWC
article_text:
The partners of management-consulting firm Booz & Co. have approved the acquisition of the firm by accounting giant PricewaterhouseCoopers, which is expected to boost PwC's consulting business and spotlights the major accounting firms' push into consulting.

The deal, announced in October, is expected to close in March, subject to regulatory approval and other closing conditions, PwC said Monday.

Financial terms haven't been...
